title: Smarter defenses against AI-enabled cyber threats
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) is transforming the way organizations operate, driving speed, innovation, and efficiency across industries. title: Philippines, Asean data center markets surge amid AI-driven costs - study
description: SOUTHEAST Asia’s data center construction sector is expanding rapidly as artificial intelligence (AI) transforms regional demand for digital infrastructure, according to Turner & Townsend’s 2025 Data Centre Cost Index. The report shows that the Philippines, Malaysia, and Indonesia are among the fastest-emerging hubs, even as rising construction costs and power challenges test the pace of growth.

title: Too early to bet against AI trade, State Street suggests
description: State Street' Anna Paglia is reiterating her bullish stance on artificial intelligence stocks despite the Nasdaq’s worst week since April.
content:
State Street is reiterating its bullish stance on the artificial intelligence trade despite the Nasdaq's worst week since April.

title: Tech bloodbath: Over $1 trillion erased from US giants as AI-fueled selloff rocks markets
description: Tech stocks linked to artificial intelligence are falling fast as fears grow that the AI boom may be a bubble. Big companies like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Tesla saw sharp losses this week. Experts say investors are losing confidence as many AI projects are not making profits. The market faces big uncertainty ahead.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - By-poll: BJD lodges complaint against CM, BJP accuses oppn party of misusing AI in campaign
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: Your Turn | Fear of AI is rooted in fear of ourselves
description: Our view of artificial intelligence is crucial because it directly shapes how we use it, as AI is a double-edged sword.

title: Assam: Nirmala Sitharaman lays foundation for University that will focus on AI, cybersecurity, drone tech, quantum computing
description: The upcoming institution, Assam's first Technology and Vocational Education and Training (T-VET) University, will be developed at a project cost of Rs 415 crore and is envisioned to shape a skilled, future-ready generation equipped in cutting-edge fields such as Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity, Drone Technology, and Quantum Computing.
content:
Gohpur (Assam) [India], November 8 (ANI): Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman laid the foundation stone for Swahid Kanaklata Barua State University at Gohpur on Saturday.
